General.Name: ASR Microelectronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: ASR Microelectronics Co., Ltd., a platform chip company, engages in the research, design, development, and sells wireless communication chips in China and internationally. The company offers cellular baseband chips for smart energy, smart payment, and mobile broadband devices. It also offers chip customization for AI algorithm, big data, internet, and industrial control applications. In addition, the company provides non-cellular IoT chips related products. Further, it offers semiconductor IP licensing services. ASR Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
